summary: Removes the requirement for Axes and Pickaxes to chop wood or mine ore.
descriptionHtml:
Removes the requirement for Axes and Pickaxes to chop wood or mine ore.

This is done by adding an invisible token weapon to the players inventory, thus leaving the ore nodes and wood chopping blocks untouched.

To uninstall simply delete the esp and the script file.
author: Montaux

files.name: No Axe or Pickaxe required
files.changelogHtml: The token should now be automatically placed
